subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Considering that Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur is the standard to which N.H.L. goalies currently aspire, the Carolina Hurricanes rookie Cam Ward measured up well in Game 1.
snippet: Considering that Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur is the standard to which N.H.L. goalies currently aspire, the Carolina Hurricanes rookie Cam Ward measured up well in Game 1.
